Package com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data

Class ROM

java.lang.Object
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data.MemoryBlock
com.github.dsvalerian.chip8.data.ROM
public class ROM extends MemoryBlock
Representation of a block of read-only memory containing byte data, where each register in the block is one byte.

  • Method Details

    • fromBytes

      public static ROM fromBytes(int[] bytes)
      Return a new ROM block containing byte data.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The byte data.
      Returns:
      A new ROM.

    • fromHexString

      public static ROM fromHexString(String hexString)
      Return a new ROM block containing byte data parsed from a hex string in the following format: "byte byte byte". Example: "05 FF D3 F1 49".
      Parameters:
      hexString - The string containing whitespace-separated bytes in hex form.
      Returns:
      A new ROM.

    • fromFile

      public static ROM fromFile(Path filePath) throws IOException
      Return a new ROM containing byte data from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The Path to the file.
      Returns:
      A new ROM or null if filepath is incorrect.
      Throws:
      IOException - if given file path is not valid or there is issue reading the bytes.

    • fromFile

      public static ROM fromFile(String filePath) throws IOException
      Return a new ROM containing byte data from a file.
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the file.
      Returns:
      A new ROM or null if filepath is incorrect.
      Throws:
      IOException - if given file path is not valid or there is issue reading the bytes.

    • fromEmpty

      public static ROM fromEmpty()
      Return a new empty ROM.
      Returns:
      An empty ROM.

    • set

      public void set(int address, Register value)
      Unsupported operation. Cannot set an address in read-only memory.
      Overrides:
      set in class MemoryBlock
      Parameters:
      address - The address to set.
      value - A Register that is storing the value to set.
